preConditions.sqlCheck:
select count(*) from TEST_CASE tc inner join TEST_CASE_LIBRARY_NODE tcln on tc.tcln_id = tcln.tcln_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM nature on tc.tc_nature = nature.item_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM type on tc.tc_type = type.item_id
where tcln.name='feat-1108-undefined-undefined' and nature.code='NAT_UNDEFINED' and type.code='TYP_UNDEFINED'

select count(*) from TEST_CASE tc inner join TEST_CASE_LIBRARY_NODE tcln on tc.tcln_id = tcln.tcln_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM nature on tc.tc_nature = nature.item_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM type on tc.tc_type = type.item_id
where tcln.name='feat-1108-functionaltesting-compliancetesting' and nature.code='NAT_FUNCTIONAL_TESTING' and type.code='TYP_COMPLIANCE_TESTING'

select count(*) from TEST_CASE tc inner join TEST_CASE_LIBRARY_NODE tcln on tc.tcln_id = tcln.tcln_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM nature on tc.tc_nature = nature.item_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM type on tc.tc_type = type.item_id
where tcln.name='feat-1108-businesstesting-correctiontesting' and nature.code='NAT_BUSINESS_TESTING' and type.code='TYP_CORRECTION_TESTING'

select count(*) from TEST_CASE tc inner join TEST_CASE_LIBRARY_NODE tcln on tc.tcln_id = tcln.tcln_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM nature on tc.tc_nature = nature.item_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM type on tc.tc_type = type.item_id
where tcln.name='feat-1108-usertesting-evolutiontesting' and nature.code='NAT_USER_TESTING' and type.code='TYP_EVOLUTION_TESTING'

select count(*) from TEST_CASE tc inner join TEST_CASE_LIBRARY_NODE tcln on tc.tcln_id = tcln.tcln_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM nature on tc.tc_nature = nature.item_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM type on tc.tc_type = type.item_id
where tcln.name='feat-1108-nonfunctionaltesting-regressiontesting' and nature.code='NAT_NON_FUNCTIONAL_TESTING' and type.code='TYP_REGRESSION_TESTING'

select count(*) from TEST_CASE tc inner join TEST_CASE_LIBRARY_NODE tcln on tc.tcln_id = tcln.tcln_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM nature on tc.tc_nature = nature.item_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM type on tc.tc_type = type.item_id
where tcln.name='feat-1108-performancetesting-endtoendtesting' and nature.code='NAT_PERFORMANCE_TESTING' and type.code='TYP_END_TO_END_TESTING'

select count(*) from TEST_CASE tc inner join TEST_CASE_LIBRARY_NODE tcln on tc.tcln_id = tcln.tcln_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM nature on tc.tc_nature = nature.item_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM type on tc.tc_type = type.item_id
where tcln.name='feat-1108-securitytesting-partnertesting' and nature.code='NAT_SECURITY_TESTING' and type.code='TYP_PARTNER_TESTING'

select count(*) from TEST_CASE tc inner join TEST_CASE_LIBRARY_NODE tcln on tc.tcln_id = tcln.tcln_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM nature on tc.tc_nature = nature.item_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM type on tc.tc_type = type.item_id
where tcln.name='feat-1108-atdd-undefined' and nature.code='NAT_ATDD' and type.code='TYP_UNDEFINED'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-functional' and category.code = 'CAT_FUNCTIONAL'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-nonfunctional' and category.code = 'CAT_NON_FUNCTIONAL'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-usecase' and category.code = 'CAT_USE_CASE'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-business' and category.code = 'CAT_BUSINESS'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-testrequirement' and category.code = 'CAT_TEST_REQUIREMENT'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-undefined' and category.code = 'CAT_UNDEFINED'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-ergonomic' and category.code = 'CAT_ERGONOMIC'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-performance' and category.code = 'CAT_PERFORMANCE'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-technical' and category.code = 'CAT_TECHNICAL'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-userstory' and category.code = 'CAT_USER_STORY'

select count(*) from REQUIREMENT_VERSION rv inner join RESOURCE r on rv.res_id = r.res_id inner join INFO_LIST_ITEM category on rv.category = category.item_id
where r.name = 'feat-1108-security' and category.code = 'CAT_SECURITY'
